text: Robert Prosky (born Robert Joseph Porzuczek, December 13, 1930 â€“ December 8, 2008) was an American actor. His best known movie roles were in Thief (1981), Christine (1983), The Natural (1984), and Broadcast News (1987). He also appeared in Gremlins 2: The New Batch (1990), Hoffa (1992), Mrs. Doubtfire (1993), Last Action Hero (1993), Miracle on 34th Street (1994), Dead Man Walking (1995), and Mad City (1997). Prosky died on December 8, 2008 at a hospital in Washington, D.C. at the age of 78. The cause of death was heart surgery-related problems.Martin, Douglas. (December 11, 2008). "Robert Prosky, 77, an Actor of Wide Range and Acumen, Is Dead" The New York Times. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2008 deaths Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Philadelphia
